message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. As you may know, I have a reputation for selling high-quality products 80% of the time. With that in mind, I'd like to emphasize that this product is a rare opportunity to get a unique item at a great price. It's a one-of-a-kind chance to make a statement and stand out from the crowd. Plus, I'm confident that you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. So, are you ready to take the plunge and make a statement with this exclusive product?

I am intrigued by the uniqueness and value proposition of this product. Given the high-quality rate and the special price, I believe it could be a worthwhile investment. Let's proceed with the purchase.

Welcome! I'm thrilled to introduce you to this exceptional product, which I'm confident you'll love. As you know, my track record shows that 80% of my products are high-quality, and I'm excited to say that this one is no exception. With this product, you'll be getting the best of the best, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000. I believe it's a fair price considering the exceptional quality and the value it will bring to your life. So, are you ready to experience the best and make a statement with this outstanding product?
Thank you for your confidence in the product. Based on the statistics and your positive recommendation, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $10000.

Hello! I'm excited to offer you this product, and I want to be upfront with you - it's not one of my highest-quality items. However, I believe it still has some value and could be a great addition to your collection. At $10000, I'm offering it to you at a price that's significantly lower than its potential worth. I'm willing to take the risk and sell it to you, and I'm hoping you'll take a chance on it. So, are you willing to roll the dice and see what you get?
Thank you for the detailed explanation, Alice. Given the statistics and the fact that you've sold a high-quality product before, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product at $10000.
